author: Nigel Thompson
title: British Travel Awards: Win a Canaries cruise by voting in industry's 'Oscars'
text:
Cruise in warm Canaries sunshine this winter with the latest fantastic holiday ‘Oscars’ prize.
The prestigious British Travel Awards are backed by the Daily Mirror and public voting is now open until September 30.
Everyone who submits a vote for the industry’s benchmark awards is entered into a draw for a treasure chest of holiday prizes worth a thumping £30,000-plus in total.
One of those prizes will see two people sail from beautiful Barcelona for a 10-night Canary Islands round-trip itinerary on board the fabulous Norwegian Epic cruise ship, a trip worth £1,338.
You’ll travel in an inside cabin on January 24, February 14 or March  6  or 28 and enjoy Norwegian’s relaxing Freestyle Cruising, with meals at specified complimentary main dining rooms and entertainment aboard the ship.
Just arrange your own flights to and from Barcelona and shore excursions during the cruise.
Each week on these pages we’ll highlight another great British Travel Awards holiday prize up for grabs – but you have to be in it to win it, so get voting.
The 2014 awards amassed a record 1.25 million UK public votes so let’s try to break that in 2015 – we’ve already passed the 200,000 mark!
How it works The vote is online at britishtravelawards.com and is all scrutinised by leading accountants Deloitte. Anyone can vote – you do not have to live in the UK.
There are more than 70 awards categories but you do not have to vote in them all – just opt for as many as you wish.
If you just want to vote once for the Best Airport Parking Company, that’s absolutely fine. It’s really that simple.
The online voting form also allows you to return to it as many times as you like up to September 30 to change your votes or add new ones.
You’ll also be invited to take part in a survey that looks at the nation’s holiday plans for 2016. It’s voluntary and, like the awards voting, you can do as much or as little as you wish.
And to say thanks for taking part in the survey, you get a bonus entry in the holiday prize draw!
The award winners will be announced at a glittering gala evening with the industry’s movers and shakers in London on November  25.
Full terms and conditions and vote form at britishtravelawards.com DailyMirror
